items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: A simple and intuitive command-line todo list application built with TypeScript. Easily manage your tasks with features for adding, updating, and deleting todo items. Stay organized and boost your productivity with this lightweight CLI tool.

items.content_html: Google TasksBoard Lite is a simplified task management application inspired by Google's TasksBoard interface. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this lightweight version focuses on local storage for task persistence, making it beginner-friendly. Enjoy a familiar look and feel while managing your tasks efficiently.
items.title: rahulpaul127/Google-TasksBoard-Clone: Google TasksBoard Lite is a simplified task management application inspired by Google's TasksBoard interface. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this lightweight version focuses on local storage for task persistence, making it beginner-friendly. Enjoy a familiar look and feel while managing your tasks efficiently.

items.content_html: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: ghiscoding/vanilla-calendar-picker: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
